amendatorysection.catchline: Tax Commissioner; examination and audit of books of Auditor of Public Accounts; report to Governor and Clerk of the Legislature.
amendatorysection.para: The Tax Commissioner shall annually examine and audit or supervise and direct the examination and audit of the books, accounts, vouchers, records, and expenditures of the office of Auditor of Public Accounts and report promptly to the Governor and the Clerk of the Legislature the result of such examination and audit. The report submitted to the Clerk of the Legislature shall be submitted electronically. Each member of the Legislature shall receive an electronic copy of such report by making a request for it to the Tax Commissioner.

crossreference.para: Legislative purpose, Department of Administrative Services, see section 81-1101.
